intro: Acronia werneri, commonly known as the Werneri's acronia, is a species of flowering plant in the family Apocynaceae. Acronia werneri is often found in rocky or sandy soils in arid or semi-arid regions. It is not widely cultivated but is of interest to botanists due to its unique morphology and ecological adaptations.
